org.nasdanika.html.echarts

Interface OptionBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Supplier<org.json.JSONObject>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptionBuilderImpl

    public interface OptionBuilder
extends Supplier<org.json.JSONObject>
    Interface to build ECharts option object - https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#title
    Author:
    Pavel

      • init

        String init(String id)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element with a given ID and the option from this builder.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of an existing HTML element.
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initialize the chart.

      • init

        String init(HTMLElement<?> htmlElement)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element and the option from this builder. If the element already has an id, that id is used, otherwise it is generated and set by this call.
        Parameters:
        htmlElement - Chart's DOM container.
        option - Option
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initalize the chart.

      • create

        Fragment create(Object width,
                Object height)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code using the option from this builder.
        Parameters:
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        Returns:
        Fragment with the chart container and initialization script.

      • create

        void create(Object width,
            Object height,
            Consumer<Object> consumer)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code using the option from this builder.
        Parameters:
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        consumer - Consumer to accept the generated container and script.
